LoreDroppers.Name: Janitor
LoreDroppers.Dialog: Hey you. You've finally arrived. I was wondering when you'll show up to collect your socks. They've been placed at the summit already.

LoreDroppers.Name: Janitor
LoreDroppers.Dialog: They say he or she who shows up after closing hours to retrieve their socks at the summit is the one who will claim UNKNOWN, but AWESOME power!

LoreDroppers.Name: Janitor
LoreDroppers.Dialog: Obviously many have tried to make the climb...

LoreDroppers.Name: Janitor
LoreDroppers.Dialog: But in the end, they've all failed...

LoreDroppers.Name: Janitor
LoreDroppers.Dialog: Some give up while making excellent progress. Some give up immediately and some are never seen again...

LoreDroppers.Name: Janitor
LoreDroppers.Dialog: But I believe, you may be the one. The first to finally reclaim their pair of socks and claim the unknown, but awesome power!

LoreDroppers.Name: Janitor
LoreDroppers.Dialog: But, then again I thought that about Peter, Ellie, Nathan, Izzy and Sarah.

LoreDroppers.Name: Janitor
LoreDroppers.Dialog: The most recent one who tried the climb was Jerry. He started his climb not too long ago.

LoreDroppers.Name: Janitor
LoreDroppers.Dialog: Good luck! Believe in your mind and do whatever it takes to not give into despair!

LoreDroppers.Name: JerryScroll
LoreDroppers.Dialog: The climb has started. I know I can do this. Nothing will stop me!

LoreDroppers.Name: JerryScroll
LoreDroppers.Dialog: The janitor said I was the one. So far so good only a few falls so far.

LoreDroppers.Name: JerryScroll
LoreDroppers.Dialog: When I do fall, I get back up no matter how frustrating it may be.

LoreDroppers.Name: JerryScroll
LoreDroppers.Dialog: I must be him. I know it.

LoreDroppers.Name: JerryScroll
LoreDroppers.Dialog: To whom ever may read this. Stop now before you embarrass yourself

LoreDroppers.Name: JerryScroll
LoreDroppers.Dialog: Because if you so reach the top (which you won't'). You'll be forever known as the 'second one who claimed their socks''.

LoreDroppers.Name: JerryNotebook
LoreDroppers.Dialog: How many days has passed since I've started the climb? The janitor told me I was the one!

LoreDroppers.Name: JerryNotebook
LoreDroppers.Dialog: He said Peter, Ellie, Nathan, Izzy and Sarah have all failed, but he could see I was the one.

LoreDroppers.Name: JerryNotebook
LoreDroppers.Dialog: And I know I am the one. I cannot begin to doubt myself now, I've come so far.

LoreDroppers.Name: JerryNotebook
LoreDroppers.Dialog: The floors are buttered. Who butters their floor, a genius or a madman?

LoreDroppers.Name: JerryNotebook
LoreDroppers.Dialog: I can't find my footing because I keep sliding.

LoreDroppers.Name: JerryNotebook
LoreDroppers.Dialog: I don't remember the last time I had a proper meal.

LoreDroppers.Name: JerryNotebook
LoreDroppers.Dialog: All I've had is Butter.

LoreDroppers.Name: JerryNotebook
LoreDroppers.Dialog: Butter for breakfast...

LoreDroppers.Name: JerryNotebook
LoreDroppers.Dialog: Butter for lunch...

LoreDroppers.Name: JerryNotebook
LoreDroppers.Dialog: Butter for dinner...

LoreDroppers.Name: JerryNotebook
LoreDroppers.Dialog: Day by day the butter takes it's toll, but I have to keep trying.

LoreDroppers.Name: JerryNotebook
LoreDroppers.Dialog: But I'm so sick of butter...

LoreDroppers.Name: JerryNotebook
LoreDroppers.Dialog: Speaking of which, It's time for dinner. Guess what it is!

LoreDroppers.Name: JerryNotebook
LoreDroppers.Dialog: A butter sandwich... Two slices of butter and a thick slice of butter! HAHAHAHAHA.

LoreDroppers.Name: Jerry
LoreDroppers.Dialog: I wish I never started. I wish I never started...

LoreDroppers.Name: Jerry
LoreDroppers.Dialog: I've managed to make progress, but I can't do it anymore.

LoreDroppers.Name: Jerry
LoreDroppers.Dialog: I've lost count on how many times I've fallen and gotten back up to this exact spot.

LoreDroppers.Name: Jerry
LoreDroppers.Dialog: But, it is all too much on the physical and the mental.

LoreDroppers.Name: Jerry
LoreDroppers.Dialog: In the end I never thought it would end like this.

LoreDroppers.Name: Jerry
LoreDroppers.Dialog: An onset of delirium and then an eternal slumber caused by my refusal to consume anymore butter.

LoreDroppers.Name: Jerry
LoreDroppers.Dialog: I cannot physically nor mentally consume anymore butter. I cannot...

LoreDroppers.Name: Jerry
LoreDroppers.Dialog: I thought my mind unbreakable, unbending...

LoreDroppers.Name: Jerry
LoreDroppers.Dialog: But, being stranded here... Alone. All by myself...

LoreDroppers.Name: Jerry
LoreDroppers.Dialog: With nothing, but my own thoughts and butter. I've come to realise something.

LoreDroppers.Name: Jerry
LoreDroppers.Dialog: The mind may be your greatest ally, but it can also be your greatest enemy...

LoreDroppers.Name: Jerry
LoreDroppers.Dialog: And butter? Butter is...

LoreDroppers.Name: Socks
LoreDroppers.Dialog: I'm suprised you've mananaged to reach the summit, to finally reach me....

LoreDroppers.Name: Socks
LoreDroppers.Dialog: I never expected anyone to reach me after Jerry succumbed to butter...

LoreDroppers.Name: Socks
LoreDroppers.Dialog: You have rose and you have fallen, but the most important thing is...

LoreDroppers.Name: Socks
LoreDroppers.Dialog: You got back up, and that has made all the difference.

LoreDroppers.Name: Socks
LoreDroppers.Dialog: I then must hereby present you with the UNKNOWN, but AWESOME power!

LoreDroppers.Name: Socks
LoreDroppers.Dialog: GET READY! AND THANK THE JANITOR.... AHHHHHHHHH.

LoreDroppers.Name: Janitor
LoreDroppers.Dialog: Hey you. You've finally arrived. I was right wasn't I?

LoreDroppers.Name: Janitor
LoreDroppers.Dialog: You are him. You really did it!

LoreDroppers.Name: Janitor
LoreDroppers.Dialog: You claimed the UNKNOWN, but AWESOME power!

LoreDroppers.Name: Janitor
LoreDroppers.Dialog: You claimed the Socks when no one else could...

LoreDroppers.Name: Janitor
LoreDroppers.Dialog: Finally... My work has finally bore fruit and I can finally focus on cleaning.

LoreDroppers.Name: Janitor
LoreDroppers.Dialog: Congratulations. After all you're hardship and perseverance.

LoreDroppers.Name: Janitor
LoreDroppers.Dialog: You deserve this.

LoreDroppers.Name: Janitor
LoreDroppers.Dialog: What's this, how do you use the UNKNOWN, but AWESOME power?

LoreDroppers.Name: Janitor
LoreDroppers.Dialog: You just wear the socks, it's that easy!

LoreDroppers.Name: Janitor
LoreDroppers.Dialog: Did you think you would gain magical power that let's you bend reality to your will?'

LoreDroppers.Name: Janitor
LoreDroppers.Dialog: How preposterous and foolish! You have something even greater!

LoreDroppers.Name: Janitor
LoreDroppers.Dialog: Try it with sandals, and now get out or reach the top again.
